lead_paragraph: Power brokers are in the Swiss Alps to discuss how to make globalization more lucrative, but there is no appetite for redistributing wealth or empowering workers.
snippet: Power brokers are in the Swiss Alps to discuss how to make globalization more lucrative, but there is no appetite for redistributing wealth or empowering workers....

headline.main: Davos Elite Fret About Inequality Over Vintage Wine and Canapés
headline.print_headline: Amid Populist Fury, Elite Mull Inequity, but Avoid Talk of Sacrifice
